description:
misc/bash: Replace bash script with go comp cmd.

This now has support for all of the 'go tool' tools, godoc,
and gofmt. It's also much faster than the bash script, and
cleaner and easier to modify in the future. It is not, however,
fully complete. 'go tool pack' doesn't have support for options,
and pkg listing is a little odd, although it does work. It also
doesn't support cmd/<pkg> format completion for godoc, but it
shouldn't be too much of a problem to implement.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

subject: code review 5939043: misc/bash: Replace bash script with go comp cmd.
